definitions.definition: An intimate physical embrace, typically while lying (or sitting): a snuggle , an instance of lying together snugly, as one might with a partner (more intimate than a hug , and typically of longer duration).
An affectionate embrace , a hug , such as is given to family members and close friends (less intimate than a snuggle , and typically of shorter duration).
examples: Give me a cuddle , Paul; it'll cheer you up.

main_definition: ( US ) An intimate physical embrace, typically while lying (or sitting): a snuggle , an instance of lying together snugly, as one might with a partner (more intimate than a hug , and typically of longer duration).
secondary_definitions: ( UK ) An affectionate embrace , a hug , such as is given to family members and close friends (less intimate than a snuggle , and typically of shorter duration).
